page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT,K.UNDERWOOD cont.
page.content:
In the area are two self-employed businessmen. One has his own light engineering works based at his home and the other a clay pigeon manufact- uring business in Corby, Northants. There is also a contract builder and a self-employed painter and decorator.
A high proportion of{professional} people live in the area, many of whom are employed in education; namely one headteacher, six teachers, a part-time lecturer in adult education, a school worker and a school matron who works in Oxford. The teachers work in Bourne, Spalding, Stamford and Grantham. Other professionals are a solicitor working in Spalding, a civil engineer working in Tallington, a sales executive for a Ketton cement manufacturer, a local dentist and a trainee accountant based in Grantham.
